items.sentence: Tom went backstage to see if he could meet some of the band members.
Tom went for three weeks without shaving before his wife complained.
Tom said he\'d be very surprised if Mary didn\'t win the tournament.
Tom and Mary are talking about what they\'ll do on Valentine\'s Day.
I want to find out if Tom is going to wear the new shirt I gave him.
I wish you happiness in your personal life and success in your work.
Just because he likes painting doesn\'t mean he\'s good at painting.
A bookstore in that location wouldn\'t make enough money to survive.
In this kind of weather, it\'s best to stay home and not go outside.
Even though he lives in the United States, Tom can\'t speak English.
